casebody.data:
Pedro SOTO, Appellant
v.
Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee No. 34 EAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 23, 2019 Pedro Soto, Dallas, PA, pro se. Alan Matthew Robinson, John Craig Manning, PA Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, PA, for Appellee.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW , this 23rd day of January, 2019, the Application for Summary Relief is GRANTED. The Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
